# decort_lb_backend (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `lb_id` (Number) ID of the LB instance to backendCreate
- `name` (String) Must be unique among all backends of this LB - name of the new backend to create

- `downinter` (Number)
- `fall` (Number)
